edu.northwestern.at.utils
Class RomanNumeralUtils

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.RomanNumeralUtils

public class RomanNumeralUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Roman numeral utilities.

This static class provides various utility methods for working with Roman numerals. The range of values supported is 1 through 5000 .

public static int romanNumeralsToInteger(java.lang.String s)
Convert Roman numeral to integer.

Parameters:
s - The Roman numeral as a string.
Returns:

integerToRomanNumerals

public static java.lang.String integerToRomanNumerals(int i)
Convert integer to a Roman numeral.

Parameters:
i - The integer to convert to a Roman numeral. Must be 1 < i <= 5000 .
Returns:
The corresponding Roman numeral as a string. "" if input value is invalid.
